apiOperation.shortdesc:
distance 阴影的偏移距离，以像素为单位。 angle 阴影的角度，0 到 360 度（浮点）。 color 阴影颜色，采用十六进制格式 0xRRGGBB。默认值为 0x000000。 alpha 阴影颜色的 Alpha 透明度值。有效值为 0.0 到 1.0。例如，0.25 设置透明度值为 25%。 blurX 水平模糊量。有效值为 0 到 255.0（浮点）。 blurY 垂直模糊量。有效值为 0 到 255.0（浮点）。 strength 印记或跨页的强度。该值越高，压印的颜色越深，而且阴影与背景之间的对比度也越强。有效值为 0 到 255.0。 quality 应用滤镜的次数。使用 BitmapFilterQuality 常量： BitmapFilterQuality.LOW BitmapFilterQuality.MEDIUM BitmapFilterQuality.HIGH 有关这些值的详细信息，请参阅 quality 属性说明。
inner 表示阴影是否为内侧阴影。值 true 指定内侧阴影。值 false 指定外侧阴影（对象外缘周围的阴影）。 knockout 应用挖空效果 (true)，这将有效地使对象的填色变为透明，并显示文档的背景颜色。 hideObject 表示是否隐藏对象。如果值为 true，则表示没有绘制对象本身，只有阴影是可见的。

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
distance 阴影的偏移距离，以像素为单位。 angle 阴影的角度，0 到 360 度（浮点）。 color 阴影颜色，采用十六进制格式 0xRRGGBB。默认值为 0x000000。 alpha 阴影颜色的 Alpha 透明度值。有效值为 0.0 到 1.0。例如，0.25 设置透明度值为 25%。 blurX 水平模糊量。有效值为 0 到 255.0（浮点）。 blurY 垂直模糊量。有效值为 0 到 255.0（浮点）。 strength 印记或跨页的强度。该值越高，压印的颜色越深，而且阴影与背景之间的对比度也越强。有效值为 0 到 255.0。 quality 应用滤镜的次数。使用 BitmapFilterQuality 常量： BitmapFilterQuality.LOW BitmapFilterQuality.MEDIUM BitmapFilterQuality.HIGH 有关这些值的详细信息，请参阅 quality 属性说明。
inner 表示阴影是否为内侧阴影。值 true 指定内侧阴影。值 false 指定外侧阴影（对象外缘周围的阴影）。 knockout 应用挖空效果 (true)，这将有效地使对象的填色变为透明，并显示文档的背景颜色。 hideObject 表示是否隐藏对象。如果值为 true，则表示没有绘制对象本身，只有阴影是可见的。

apiValue.shortdesc: CENTER : String = "center" [静态] 指定与容器中心对齐。 TextAlign END : String = "end" [静态] 指定结束边缘对齐 - 文本与书写顺序的结束端对齐。 TextAlign JUSTIFY : String = "justify" [静态] 指定文本在行内两端对齐，以便位于容器空间范围内。 TextAlign LEFT : String = "left" [静态] 指定左边缘对齐。 TextAlign RIGHT : String = "right" [静态] 指定右边缘对齐。 TextAlign START : String = "start" [静态] 指定起始边缘对齐 - 文本与书写顺序的起始端对齐。

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: CENTER : String = "center" [静态] 指定与容器中心对齐。 TextAlign END : String = "end" [静态] 指定结束边缘对齐 - 文本与书写顺序的结束端对齐。 TextAlign JUSTIFY : String = "justify" [静态] 指定文本在行内两端对齐，以便位于容器空间范围内。 TextAlign LEFT : String = "left" [静态] 指定左边缘对齐。 TextAlign RIGHT : String = "right" [静态] 指定右边缘对齐。 TextAlign START : String = "start" [静态] 指定起始边缘对齐 - 文本与书写顺序的起始端对齐。

apiValue.shortdesc: Constant Defined By BOTTOM : String = "bottom" [static] Specifies alignment with the bottom edge of the frame.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Constant Defined By BOTTOM : String = "bottom" [static] Specifies alignment with the bottom edge of the frame. VerticalAlign JUSTIFY : String = "justify" [static] Specifies vertical line justification within the frame VerticalAlign MIDDLE : String = "middle" [static] Specifies alignment with the middle of the frame. VerticalAlign TOP : String = "top" [static] Specifies alignment with the top edge of the frame. VerticalAlign
FormatValue.INHERIT

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The DataProvider class provides methods and properties that allow you to query and modify the data in any list-based component--for example, in a List, DataGrid, TileList, or ComboBox component.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
The DataProvider class provides methods and properties that allow you to query and modify the data in any list-based component--for example, in a List, DataGrid, TileList, or ComboBox component.
A data provider is a linear collection of items that serve as a data source--for example, an array. Each item in a data provider is an object or XML object that contains one or more fields of data. You can access the items that are contained in a data provider by index, by using the DataProvider.getItemAt() method.

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched after the data is changed.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched after the data is changed.

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched before the data is changed.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched before the data is changed.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Creates a new DataProvider object using a list, XML instance or an array of data objects as the data source.

apiParam.apiDesc: The data that is used to create the DataProvider.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Creates a new DataProvider object using a list, XML instance or an array of data objects as the data source.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Adds a new item to the data provider at the specified index.

apiException.apiDesc: The specified index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the length of the data provider.

apiParam.apiDesc: An object that contains the data for the item to be added.
The index at which the item is to be added.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Adds a new item to the data provider at the specified index. If the index that is specified exceeds the length of the data provider, the index is ignored.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Appends an item to the end of the data provider.

apiParam.apiDesc: The item to be appended to the end of the current data provider.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Appends an item to the end of the data provider.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Adds several items to the data provider at the specified index and dispatches a DataChangeType.ADD event.

apiException.apiDesc: The specified index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the length of the data provider.

apiParam.apiDesc: The items to be added to the data provider.
The index at which the items are to be inserted.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Adds several items to the data provider at the specified index and dispatches a DataChangeType.ADD event.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Appends multiple items to the end of the DataProvider and dispatches a DataChangeType.ADD event.

apiParam.apiDesc: The items to be appended to the data provider.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Appends multiple items to the end of the DataProvider and dispatches a DataChangeType.ADD event. The items are added in the order in which they are specified.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Creates a copy of the current DataProvider object.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A new instance of this DataProvider object.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Creates a copy of the current DataProvider object.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Concatenates the specified items to the end of the current data provider.

asCustoms.internal: Is this method any different than addItems()? It's not clear. I also thing "concatenates the items o sounds odd. Perhaps the concatenated items are added to the end of the data provider?

apiParam.apiDesc: The items to be added to the data provider.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Concatenates the specified items to the end of the current data provider. This method dispatches a DataChangeType.ADD event.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the item at the specified index.

apiException.apiDesc: The specified index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the length of the data provider.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The item at the specified index.

apiParam.apiDesc: Location of the item to be returned.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the item at the specified index.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the index of the specified item.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The index of the specified item, or -1 if the specified item is not found.

apiParam.apiDesc: The item to be located.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the index of the specified item.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Invalidates the item at the specified index.

apiException.apiDesc: The specified index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the length of the data provider.

apiParam.apiDesc: Index of the item to be invalidated.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Invalidates the item at the specified index. An item is invalidated after it is changed; the DataProvider automatically redraws the invalidated item.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Invalidates the specified item.

apiParam.apiDesc: Item to be invalidated.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Invalidates the specified item. An item is invalidated after it is changed; the DataProvider automatically redraws the invalidated item.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Invalidates all the data items that the DataProvider contains and dispatches a DataChangeEvent.INVALIDATE_ALL event.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Invalidates all the data items that the DataProvider contains and dispatches a DataChangeEvent.INVALIDATE_ALL event. Items are invalidated after they are changed; the DataProvider automatically redraws the invalidated items.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Appends the specified data into the data that the data provider contains and removes any duplicate items.

apiParam.apiDesc: Data to be merged into the data provider.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Appends the specified data into the data that the data provider contains and removes any duplicate items. This method dispatches a DataChangeType.ADD event.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Removes all items from the data provider and dispatches a DataChangeType.REMOVE_ALL event.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Removes all items from the data provider and dispatches a DataChangeType.REMOVE_ALL event.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Removes the item at the specified index and dispatches a DataChangeType.REMOVE event.

apiException.apiDesc: The specified index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the length of the data provider.

apiParam.apiDesc: Index of the item to be removed.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Removes the item at the specified index and dispatches a DataChangeType.REMOVE event.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Removes the specified item from the data provider and dispatches a DataChangeType.REMOVE event.

apiParam.apiDesc: Item to be removed.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Removes the specified item from the data provider and dispatches a DataChangeType.REMOVE event.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Replaces the item at the specified index and dispatches a DataChangeType.REPLACE event.

apiException.apiDesc: The specified index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the length of the data provider.

apiParam.apiDesc: The replacement item.
The index of the item to be replaced.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Replaces the item at the specified index and dispatches a DataChangeType.REPLACE event.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Replaces an existing item with a new item and dispatches a DataChangeType.REPLACE event.

apiException.apiDesc: The item could not be found in the data provider.

apiParam.apiDesc: The item to be replaced.
The replacement item.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Replaces an existing item with a new item and dispatches a DataChangeType.REPLACE event.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sorts the items that the data provider contains by the specified field and dispatches a DataChangeType.SORT event.

asCustoms.internal: If an array of string values is passed, does the sort take place in the order that the string values are specified? Also, it might be helpful if "options for sorting" was more explicit. I wondered if that meant sort type, like merge sort or bubble sort, for example, but when I looked up "uniquesort" it seemed like not.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The return value depends on whether the method receives any arguments. For more information, see the Array.sortOn() method. If the sortOption property is set to Array.UNIQUESORT, this method returns 0.

apiParam.apiDesc: The item field by which to sort. This value can be a string or an array of string values.
Options for sorting.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sorts the items that the data provider contains by the specified field and dispatches a DataChangeType.SORT event. The specified field can be a string, or an array of string values that designate multiple fields to sort on in order of precedence.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sorts the items that the data provider contains and dispatches a DataChangeType.SORT event.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The return value depends on whether the method receives any arguments. See the Array.sort() method for more information. This method returns 0 when the sortOption property is set to Array.UNIQUESORT.

apiParam.apiDesc: The arguments to use for sorting.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sorts the items that the data provider contains and dispatches a DataChangeType.SORT event.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Creates an Array object representation of the data that the data provider contains.

apiReturn.apiDesc: An Array object representation of the data that the data provider contains.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Creates an Array object representation of the data that the data provider contains.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Creates a string representation of the data that the data provider contains.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A string representation of the data that the data provider contains.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Creates a string representation of the data that the data provider contains.

apiValue.shortdesc: The number of items that the data provider contains.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The number of items that the data provider contains.

apiParam.apiDesc: 数据项目所在的列。
数据项目所在的行

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The SimpleCollectionItem class defines a single item in an inspectable property that represents a data provider.

asCustoms.internal: Is this revised description correct? Adobe: [LM} Yes, its ok.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The SimpleCollectionItem class defines a single item in an inspectable property that represents a data provider. A SimpleCollectionItem object is a collection list item that contains only label and data properties--for example, a ComboBox or List component.

apiValue.shortdesc: The data property of the object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The data property of the object.

apiValue.shortdesc: The label property of the object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
The label property of the object.
The default value is label(n), where n is the ordinal index.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The DataChangeType class defines constants for the DataChangeEvent.changeType event.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The DataChangeType class defines constants for the DataChangeEvent.changeType event. These constants are used by the DataChangeEvent class to identify the type of change that was applied to the data in a list-based component such as a List, ComboBox, TileList, or DataGrid.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: A change was made to the data contained in an item.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The data provider was sorted. This constant is used to indicate a change in the order of the data, not a change in the data itself.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The DataChangeEvent class defines the event that is dispatched when the data that is associated with a component changes.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
The DataChangeEvent class defines the event that is dispatched when the data that is associated with a component changes. This event is used by the List, DataGrid, TileList, and ComboBox components.
This class provides the following event:
DataChangeEvent.DATA_CHANGE: dispatched when the component data changes.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Creates a new DataChangeEvent object with the specified parameters.

apiParam.apiDesc: The type of change event.
The type of change that was made. The DataChangeType class defines the possible values for this parameter.
A list of items that were changed.
The index of the first item that was changed.
The index of the last item that was changed.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Creates a new DataChangeEvent object with the specified parameters.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Creates a copy of the DataEvent object and sets the value of each parameter to match that of the original.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A new DataChangeEvent object with property values that match those of the original.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Creates a copy of the DataEvent object and sets the value of each parameter to match that of the original.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a string that contains all the properties of the DataChangeEvent object.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A string that contains all the properties of the DataChangeEvent object.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Returns a string that contains all the properties of the DataChangeEvent object. The string is in the following format:
[DataChangeEvent type=value changeType=value startIndex=value endIndex=value bubbles=value cancelable=value]

apiValue.shortdesc: Defines the value of the type property of a dataChange event object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Defines the value of the type property of a dataChange event object.
This event has the following properties:
PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse; there is no default behavior to cancel.
changeTypeIdentifies the type of change that was made.
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the event object with an event listener.
endIndexIdentifies the index of the last changed item.
itemsAn array that lists the items that were changed.
startIndexIdentifies the index of the first changed item.
targetThe object that dispatched the event. The target is not always the object listening for the event. Use the currentTarget property to access the object that is listening for the event.

apiValue.shortdesc: Defines the value of the type property of a preDataChange event object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Defines the value of the type property of a preDataChange event object. This event object is dispatched before a change is made to component data.
This event has the following properties:
PropertyValue
bubblesfalse
cancelablefalse; there is no default behavior to cancel.
changeTypeIdentifies the type of change to be made.
currentTargetThe object that is actively processing the event object with an event listener.
endIndexIdentifies the index of the last item to be changed.
itemsAn array that lists the items to be changed.
startIndexIdentifies the index of the first item to be changed.
targetThe object that dispatched the event. The target is not always the object listening for the event. Use the currentTarget property to access the object that is listening for the event.

apiValue.shortdesc: Gets the type of the change that triggered the event.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Gets the type of the change that triggered the event. The DataChangeType class defines the possible values for this property.

apiValue.shortdesc: Gets the index of the last changed item in the array of items that were changed.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Gets the index of the last changed item in the array of items that were changed.

apiValue.shortdesc: Gets an array that contains the changed items.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Gets an array that contains the changed items.

apiValue.shortdesc: Gets the index of the first changed item in the array of items that were changed.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Gets the index of the first changed item in the array of items that were changed.

apiParam.apiDesc: 不带 p 标签
default false 是否包含空格
对象的注册点都必须在左上角上。 这个是根据注册点来计算的，如果注册不在左上角 0，0 位置上，计算出来的结果将不准确。

apiOperation.shortdesc: child 是否是 obj 的子对象

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: child 是否是 obj 的子对象

apiOperation.shortdesc: 样式表

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: 样式表

apiOperation.shortdesc: 组件 容器，不能为空，这个容器，只是为了组件，在显示的时候，不能超出的边缘，比如下拉框，它的显示在最顶层的，为了方便 控制，组件会根据这个容器的进行判断，并自行进行调整， 所以这个容器的的 parent 不能为空，也就是说这个容器必须已经添加到显示列表中。

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: 组件 容器，不能为空，这个容器，只是为了组件，在显示的时候，不能超出的边缘，比如下拉框，它的显示在最顶层的，为了方便 控制，组件会根据这个容器的进行判断，并自行进行调整， 所以这个容器的的 parent 不能为空，也就是说这个容器必须已经添加到显示列表中。
